main event: One red and yellow egg-shaped object with a tail was observed flying out of sight after 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was seen for a duration of 15 minutes., The observation was made from the ground., The object was described as red and yellow with an egg shape., The source of the sighting was a civilian., There is a possibility that the object was an aircraft.
